committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Navigation

official_title: To improve vessel navigational accuracy and enhance ship safety in order to protect the marine environment.
short_title: Vessel Safe Navigation and Marine Environment Protection Act of 1991

summary.text: Vessel Safe Navigation and Marine Environment Protection Act of 1991 - Requires that certain vessels used for transporting oil or hazardous material, including towing vessels, have an integrated navigation system incorporating specified minimum elements. Requires all work to bring a U.S.-documented vessel into compliance to be performed in the United States using equipment manufactured in the United States. Sets forth penalties, including in rem liability. Allows injunctions and denial of entry.

titles.title: Vessel Safe Navigation and Marine Environment Protection Act of 1991
To improve vessel navigational accuracy and enhance ship safety in order to protect the marine environment.
